Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/18th
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Cermak, Damen, Roosevelt, and Western due to street blockage near Western/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Cermak, Damen, Roosevelt, and Western due to street blockage near Western/18th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green and 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Clinton. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Clinton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
